titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase and extend the authorization of appropriations for homeless veterans reintegration programs.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase and extend the authorization of appropriations for homeless veterans reintegration programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: The bill extends through FY2025 the authority for appropriations for homeless veterans reintegration programs and increases the amount authorized to be appropriated annually for such programs from $50 million to $75 million.
